entry.title: Simulation Videos of the Surrogate Models

link.title: Simulation Videos of the Surrogate Models

entry.content:
Here I am incluing some animations related to my Continuous and Stochastic Surrogate Modeling project. The first video is to illustrate the significance of the modeled term G.

Animations of the true vorticity field and the vorticity with G removed from 30s to 50s.
Left: true vorticity. Right: vorticity without G.
Animations of the true vorticity field and simulated vorticity field from 30s to 40s.
Left: true vorticity. Right: simulated vorticity.
entry.summary: Videos for the Continuous and Stochastic Surrogate Modeling Report
